POSTS.LINK_MATCHES: Field 'Link' must not be empty and must contain only A-Z chars, dash (-) symbol and digit numbers
POSTS.FILES_IS_STRING: Field 'Files' must be a string array

USERS.FIRST_NAME_IS_NOT_EMPTY: Field 'First name' must not be empty
USERS.FIRST_NAME_IS_STRING: Field 'First name' must be a string
USERS.LAST_NAME_IS_NOT_EMPTY: Field 'Last name' must not be empty
USERS.LAST_NAME_IS_STRING: Field 'Last name' must be a string
USERS.MIDDLE_NAME_IS_NOT_EMPTY: Field 'Middle name' must not be empty
USERS.MIDDLE_NAME_IS_STRING: Field 'Middle name' must be a string
USERS.EMAIL_IS_EMAIL: Field 'Email' must be a valid email address

FILES.TOO_LARGE: File size can't be more than {size} MB
FILES.UNSUPPORTED_MIME_TYPE: Provided file's mime type ({mimeType}) isn't supported
